modName: Dallas and Xevaria - Sexy Sisters of Battle
summary:
Twin sisters that are ready and eager to join you on your epic battle as the dragonborn.
Dallas - Frostfire Mage
Xevaria - Melee Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][i][color=#ff7700][size=4][center][i][size=6][color=#ff7700]Join Discord! [/color][color=#ffffff]- https://discord.gg/EhSyRy3[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Youtube (New) [/color][color=#ffffff]- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCv1FkgZueiMs6rAZtBG-ZWQ[/color][/size][/i]

Thanks for the download[/center][/size][/color][/i][center][i][color=#ff7700][size=4]&
Dont forget to Endorse!
[/size][/color][/i]
[color=#00ff00][size=4]Dont forget Dallas's Update file
[/size][/color]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]
[img width=816,height=126]http://i.imgur.com/5aAlIjk.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]Now with Demoniacs HD Textures!!
[/size][/color][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76593/?]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pmu7txZ.jpg?1[/img]

[/url][/size][size=5][color=#ff7700]Back Story[/color]: [size=3]Dallas and Xevaria are twin sisters, they were born in the same era that Tiber
Septim (General Talos) conquered the western part of Cyrodiil. The
girls helped Talos get to the Greybeards to hear of his prophecy. For
years Talos became corrupt from the prophecy he heard, and it drove him
mad. Cuhlecain, the king of Falkreath, to be crowned emperor on his own
will had Talos very disturbed. Talos secretly assassinated Cuhlecain to
crown him self instead. Dallas and Xevaria were in disbelief and
sickened by this action. So the girls decided to leave Talos to his own,
they ventured all of skyrim for many years befor they finally found
peace and relaxation.

Dallas at birth was infused with dragons blood, giving her powerfull fire and frost magic.[/size][/size]
[size=3]Xevaria was givin blood of a stone giant and accquired great strength and the ability to summon spiritual wolves.[/size]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]

[size=5]Dallas[/size][/color][size=5]:

[/size]Dallas is a spellcaster type follower that has quite a few perks to maxamize
her power. She focuses on Fire and Frost spells. We call her the
Frostfire Mage. Her companion spell is a flame atronach.
[color=#ff7700]
Perks[color=#ffffff]:[/color] [color=#ffffff]Impact, Augmented Frost Rank 1, Augmented Fire Rank 1, Destruction dual casting, and Destruction 00/25/50/75/100[/color][/color].

I made her from one of my presets. The preset is here[url=http://] [/url][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76064/?]Dallas Face Preset.[/url][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76064/?]
[/url]She only comes with a CBBE body.

[color=#ff7700]Location[/color]: She is located at Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath

[color=#ff7700]Complete Spell list[/color]:
- Firebolt-25
- Icespike-25
- Oakflesh-00
- IronFlesh-50
- EbonyFlesh-75
- Conjure Flame Atronach
- Incinerate-75
- Icyspear-75
- Healing-00
- Firestorm-100
- Blizzard-100
- Flames-00
- Frostbite-00



[img]http://i.imgur.com/UbwivZA.jpg?1[/img]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]Xevaria[/size][/color][size=5]:[/size]


Xevaria is a 2H melee fighter that has an strange ability to summon spirit
wolves. Where she lacks in magic she makes up in strength. Great
unstoppable force to take down giants and dragons.

[color=#ff7700]Perks[/color]: Wellfitted, Barbarian 20/40, Champions Stance, Juggernaut 20/40, Novice Conjuration

She only comes with a UNNP body.

[color=#ff7700]Location[/color]: She is located at the Bee and Barb in Riften.


[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]

Thanks to Skylaskyrim and Bad Applie Pie for making the tutorials for creating custom followers. Links here --> [url=https://youtu.be/3I1nvXOb3T4](Bad Applie Pie)VinAri0807 Tutorial[/url] - [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xcHw4sqrrx8]Skylaskyrim Tutorial
[/url]

Shout out to Plooshy with helping me with questions about this follower and followers to come!
She also has my favorite follower, Please get [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74655/?]Neve! [/url]Support the wendigos! Even tho we all killed him in all the final fantasy games =X

I encourage everyone to try and make a follower at least once. I never
thought I would be able to do it, but now I got 3 followers :)

[size=4][u][color=#ff7700][size=5]CHANGE LOG[/size][/color]:[/u][/size]

-June/24/16 - Dallas is now in the Dead Man's Drink Falkreath.

-June/24/16 - Xevarias Textures are now in the correct path.

-June/24/16 - Updated .esp for Dallas.
Removed useless Righthand/lefthand spells.
Added full range of Destruction perks (00-25-50-75-100)

-June/24/16 - Updated .esp for Dallas again

-June/29/16 - Added De Fanged and De Horned Dallas

A. Probably, when I have time I will make UNNP/CBBE variants of each sister

[color=#ff7700]2[/color].

A.

A. NifSkope, NifMerge, Skyrim CK, and Racemenu 3

[color=#ff7700]Location[/color]: Dallas- Dead Man's Drink-Falkreath, Xevaria- Bee and Barb-Riften
[color=#ff7700]Combat[/color]: Dallas- FrostFire Mage, Xevaria- 2H Juggernaut
[color=#ff7700]LevelCap[/color]: 1:1 Ratio lv150
[size=5][color=#ff7700]Requirements[/color]: XPMSE or HDT Skelleton[/size][size=2]
